manage.title: Manage policies
manage.allTeamsDescription: Detect device health issues for all hosts.
manage.teamDescription: Detect device health issues for all hosts assigned to this team.
manage.conditionalAccessUpdateError: Could not update conditional access automations.
manage.deleteError: Unable to delete {{count}} {{entity}}. Please try again.
manage.countsUpdatedTooltip:
Counts are updated hourly. Click host
counts for the most up-to-date count.
manage.automationsTooltipInherited:
To manage automations add a policy to this team.
For inherited policies select "All teams".
manage.automationsTooltip: To manage automations add a policy.

columns.name: Name
columns.criticalTooltip: This policy has been marked as critical.

automations.title: Automations
automations.selectTeamInstall:
Select a team to manage
install software automation.
automations.selectTeamCalendar:
Select a team to manage
calendar events.
automations.selectTeamScript:
Select a team to manage
run script automation.
automations.selectTeamConditionalAccess:
Select a team to manage
conditional access.
automations.contactAdmin:
Contact a user with an
admin role for access.
automations.calendarHelpText: Automatically reserve time to resolve failing policies.
automations.softwareHelpText: Install software to resolve failing policies.
automations.scriptsHelpText: Run script to resolve failing policies.
automations.conditionalAccessHelpText: Block single sign-on for hosts failing policies.
automations.otherHelpText: Create tickets or fire webhooks for failing policies.

create.title: Create policy
create.name: Name
create.criticalTooltip:
If automations are turned on, this
information is included.
create.platformRequired: At least one platform must be selected
create.platformTooltip:
Select the platforms this
policy will be checked on
to save the policy.
create.platformTooltipRun:
Select the platforms this
policy will be checked on
to save or run the policy.
create.liveQueriesDisabled: Live queries are disabled in organization settings
create.descriptionHelpText: How does this policy's failure put the organization at risk?
create.resolutionHelpText: If this policy fails, what should the end user expect?
create.targetHelpText: Policy will target hosts on selected platforms that have any of these labels:
create.autofillTooltip: AI features are disabled in organization settings
create.autofillTooltipEnabled:
Policy queries (SQL) will be sent to a
large language model (LLM). Fleet
doesn't use this data to train models.

empty.title: No policies found
empty.titleAllTeams: You don't have any policies that apply to all teams
empty.titleTeam: You don't have any policies that apply to this team
empty.description: No policies match the current filters
empty.info: Add policies to detect device health issues and trigger automations.

results.title: Results
results.noResults: Your live query returned no results.
results.noResultsExpecting: Expecting to see results? Check to see if the host{{plural}} you targeted reported "Online" or check out the "Errors" table.
results.passFailInfo: Hosts that responded with results are marked Yes. Hosts that responded with no results are marked No.
results.policyRefresh:
Fleet is collecting policy results. Try again
in about {{time}} as the system catches up.
results.inheritedTooltip: This policy runs on all hosts.

delete.title: Delete policies
delete.message: Deleting these policies will disable any associated automations, such as automatic software install or automatic script run.

otherWorkflows.title: Other workflows
otherWorkflows.destinationUrlHelpText: For each policy, Fleet will send a JSON payload to this URL with a list of the hosts that updated their answer to "No."
otherWorkflows.destinationUrlTooltip: Provide a URL to deliver a webhook request to.
otherWorkflows.integrationRequired: Please enable at least one integration:
otherWorkflows.integrationHelpText: For each policy, Fleet will create a ticket with a list of the failing hosts.
otherWorkflows.noPoliciesInfo: Add a policy to turn on automations.
otherWorkflows.helpText: The workflow will be triggered when hosts fail these policies.

calendar.title: Calendar events
calendar.resolutionWebhookUrlTooltip: Provide a URL to deliver a webhook request to.
calendar.resolutionWebhookUrlHelpText: A request will be sent to this URL during the calendar event. Use it to trigger auto-remediation.
calendar.helpText: A calendar event will be created for end users if one of their hosts fail any of these policies.
calendar.placeholderMessage: To create calendar events for end users if their hosts fail policies, you must first connect Fleet to your Google Workspace service account.
calendar.placeholderSettings: This can be configured in Settings > Integrations > Calendars.

conditionalAccess.title: Conditional access
conditionalAccess.helpText: Single sign-on will be blocked for end users whose hosts fail any of these policies.
conditionalAccess.notConfiguredMessage: To block single sign-on from hosts failing policies, you must first connect Fleet to Microsoft Entra.
conditionalAccess.notConfiguredSettings: This can be configured in Settings > Integrations > Conditional access.

installSoftware.title: Install software
installSoftware.noSoftwareMessage: Go to Software to add software to this team.
installSoftware.helpText: If compatible with the host, the selected software will be installed when hosts fail the policy. Host counts will reset when new software is selected.
installSoftware.disableSaveMessage: Add software to all selected policies to save.

runScript.title: Run script
runScript.noScriptsMessage: Go to Controls > Scripts to add scripts to this team.
runScript.helpText: If <tooltip>compatible</tooltip> with the host, the selected script will run when hosts fail the policy. The script will not run on hosts with scripts disabled, or on hosts with too many pending scripts. Host counts will reset when new scripts are selected.
runScript.compatibleTooltip:
Shell (.sh) for macOS and Linux.
PowerShell (.ps1) for Windows.
runScript.disableSaveMessage: Add scripts to all selected policies to save.
